subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*g/m/s-laj ~ r/s-lej ~ b-rej||to change, exchange, buy}}. Compare also {{cog|bo|རྗེ་བ་||to change, barter}} and {{cog|my|လှယ်||to exchange}}.

Characters {{och-l|易|id=2|to change}} and {{och-l|賜|to give}} are derivates of it.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[change]] [[place]]; to [[move]]; to move [[about]]
# to [[change]]; to [[shift]]
# to [[transplant]]
